name: Presents Collector 2
description:
Presents Collector 2 is a little game created for the 19th day of the PICO-8 Advent Calendar Project! In this game, you have to collect as much presents you can to save christmass!

Controls

 (X) - Jump
(C) - Use Item
  (Arrow Key) - Move

Power Up

In the game, you can get some Power Up by collecting presents. When you use one, you lose 1 point (because you use the toy inside the present!). You can see the item you have on the top of the screen!

 Add 5 seconds to the timer
 Increase your speed during 5 seconds
 Multiply points earned with one present by 2 during 5 seconds
Multiply points earned with one present by 3 during 5 seconds

PICO-8 Advent Calendar

This game was created for the PICO-8 Advent Calendar. Everyday during the mounth of december, you can play a new free game created with PICO-8!

More info : https://pico8-advent.tumblr.com/
Play all games on Itch : https://itch.io/c/428301/pico-8-advent
Play the game in the calendar : https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=32388

This game is a sequel of a my first PICO-8 game, Present Collector! You can find it on https://bigaston.itch.io/presents-collector (and find a remake on this game, if you find it, let me know! :p)

Credits

If you like this game, you can follow me on Twitter and support me on Ko-Fi!
Twitter : @Bigaston
Ko-Fi : Bigaston

This game use the Advancer Micro Platformer template by Matt Hughson!
